Key Arguments: The terms 'misinformation' and 'disinformation' are being used to threaten the safety and wellbeing of Australians.
Regulatory authorities, including ACMA, may be captured by external influences.
Censorship has led to high excess deaths in Australia.
The Trusted News Initiative, linked to the pharmaceutical industry, controls the narrative around COVID-19.
Censorship suppressed information about early COVID-19 treatments and vaccine risks.
The proposed ACMA powers are seen as an Orwellian move to suppress free speech and debate.
Main Themes: Influence of pharmaceutical companies and global organizations
Concerns about loss of free speech and debate
Distrust in regulatory authorities and media
Notable Quotes: Creating and throwing around the Terms 'Misinformation' and 'Disinformation' ARE the current biggest threat to the safety and the wellbeing of Australians.
Power corrupts; absolute power corrupts absolutely; ACMA already has way too much power.
May the people behind this Orwellian move to install a Ministry of Truth and the suppression of free debate, free speech and scientific discussions be brought to justice.
